  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit Windows Required

  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster

  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI (for 1080p)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
